nameEntry.part: Australian Indigenous Ministries Aggregated Collection of Records and Pictorial Material, 1903-2003

biogHist.abstract: Australian Indigenous Ministries Aggregated Collection of Records and Pictorial Material, 1903-2003 is an aggregated collection held by the State Library of New South Wales. It comprises a large amount of records created between 1903 and 2003 by the Australian Indigenous Ministries and its predecessor, the Aborigines Inland Mission. The aggregated collection is created from four smaller collections and records include photographs, admission registers, financial records, applications, correspondence, record books and minute books.
biogHist.p: Access to these records is partly restricted. Please contact the State Library of New South Wales for further information and help accessing restricted records.
Australian Indigenous Ministries Aggregated Collection Of Records And Pictorial Material, 1903-2003 is an aggregated collection made from 4 smaller collections. These collections are:

list.item: Australian Indigenous Ministries papers and pictorial material, 1903-1998

biogHist.p: Within the Australian Indigenous Ministries papers and pictorial material, 1903-1998 collection is a series of 31 silver gelatin photo prints of the Native Workers Training College and the Singleton Bible Training Institute. According to the Collection description, it contains images of the Native Workers Training College, renamed Bible Training Institute, Minimbah, Pindimar, Dallwood, Singleton. The images have been partially digitised by the Mitchell Library, with some available online. The image descriptions include the names of students when known.
The State Library of New South Wales Call numbers for this Pictorial Material are ON 259 (Series 02) and PXA 773 (Series 03).

list.item: Australian Indigenous Ministries further records, ca. 1905-1990s

biogHist.p: The records at collection and series level held within the aggregated collection are described in detail in the State Library of New South Wales' online catalogue.

archref.abstract: This image from the Australian Indigenous Ministries pictorial collection 1908 to circa 1960s is described by History of Aboriginal Sydney as being of the Singleton Aboriginal Girls' Home.
archref.note: This image may be used freely without requesting permission. Please acknowledge that the image is from the collections of the State Library of NSW.
